text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _ObservationType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in ObservationDiagnosisTypes
  • Import all the codes that are contained in LogicalObservationIdentifierNamesAndCodes
  • Import all the codes that are contained in ObservationSeriesType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in ObservationSequenceType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in AnnotationType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in ObservationIntoleranceType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in ObservationIssueTriggerCodedObservationType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in MedicationObservationType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in ObservationActContextAgeType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in GeneticObservationType

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ObservationTypeObservationTypeIdentifies the kinds of observations that can be performed
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ObservationIssueTriggerCodedObservationTypeObservationIssueTriggerCodedObservationTypeDistinguishes the kinds of coded observations that could be the trigger for clinical issue detection. These are observations that are not measurable, but instead can be defined with codes. Coded observation types include: Allergy, Intolerance, Medical Condition, Pregnancy status, etc.
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _GeneticObservationTypeGeneticObservationType**Description:** None provided

name: ObservationType
title: ObservationType
description: Identifies the kinds of observations that can be performed
